column3: Latest;Kampong Cham:  Police arrested a Vietnamese national who had been staying without a passport in Kampong Cham province on June 12
column5: a 47-year-old native of  Ho Chi Minh City
column7: came to Cambodia in 1990 to seek work and has no passport or visa.------Kampong Cham provincial police sent the man to the immigration department
column8: to follow the procedure.------The immigration police force in Kampong Cham province is working hard to take action against foreigners with incorrect or missing immigration documents.
